item.title: Pi Hole on k3s cluster
item.description: The Pi-hole is a fantastic tool that blocks DNS requests to ad servers. That means you can surf the web without having to look at ads on every page. PiHole in Kubernetes After some google search, i have found this amazing helm repo which will install pi-hole using a helm chart. I have made few updates to chart like ingress, address values; Overriding default pi-hole variables like WEBPASSWORD and TZ as a container environment variables in deployment resource.
